00116     template <typename T>
00117     void fillVectorFromA5(const std::string &fileName, const std::string &tsvName, const std::string &sampleName, std::map<std::string,T> &fillMap) {
00118         affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00119         if(file5 == NULL)
00120             Err::errAbort("Unable to create File5_File pointer.");
00121         file5->open(fileName,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00122         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=file5->openTsv(tsvName);
00123         if(tsv5 == NULL)
00124             Err::errAbort("Unable to get tsv '"+tsvName+"' in a5 file '"+fileName+"'.");
00125         
00126         std::string probeSetName;
00127         T data;
00128         while(tsv5->nextLevel(0)==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00129             tsv5->get(0,0,&probeSetName);
00130             tsv5->get(0,sampleName,&data);
00131             fillMap[probeSetName] = data;
00132         } 
00133 
00134         tsv5->close();
00135         delete tsv5;
00136         file5->close();
00137         delete file5;
00138     }
00139     void fillInCallMetrics(     std::map<std::string,int> &calls, 
00140                                 ParameterNameValueTypeList &metrics);

00143                                 const std::string &celFile,
